meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the ayes outnumbered the nays.

meanings.sent4: In the sea of voices, the ayes shone brightly like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ayes echoed through the chamber, a resounding affirmation of the proposal.

meanings.definition: The affirmative side in a debate

meanings.sent2: The ayes presented compelling arguments during the debate.

meanings.sent5: The ayes exuded confidence, their conviction palpable in every word spoken.

meanings.sent1: I ayesed enthusiastically when asked if I wanted dessert.
